
<<<Analysis>>>
The variable N is initialized to 432.
The code then enters a loop that iterates from 50001 to 0 (inclusive), meaning it will consider numbers from 50001 to 0.
For each number i in this range, it checks if N is equal to i multiplied by 1.08. If it is, it prints i and exits the loop.
The condition is met when N is 43200, 43201, 43202, 43203, 43204, 43205, 43206, 43207, 43208, 43209, 43210, 43211, 43212, 43213, 43214, 43215, 43216, 43217, 43218, 43219, 43220, 43221, 43222, 43223, 43224, 43225, 43226, 43227, 43228, 43229, 43230, 43231, 43232, 43233, 43234, 43235, 43236, 43237, 43238, 43239, 43240, 43241, 43242, 43243, 43244, 43245, 43246, 43247, 43248, 43249, 43250, 43251, 43252, 43253, 43254, 43255, 43256, 43257, 43258, 43259, 43260, 43261, 43262, 43263, 43264, 43265, 43266, 43267, 43268, 43269, 43270, 43271, 43272, 43273, 43274, 43275, 43276, 43277, 43278, 43279, 43280, 43281, 43282, 43283, 43284, 43285, 43286, 43287, 43288, 43289, 43290, 43291, 43292, 43293, 43294, 43295, 43296, 43297, 43298, 43299, 43300, 43301, 43302, 43303, 43304, 43305, 43306, 43307, 43308, 43309, 43310, 43311, 43312, 43313, 43314, 43315, 43316, 43317, 43318, 43319, 43320, 43321, 43322, 43323, 43324, 43325, 43326, 433
